name: Deeper Digging Jam
description:
CONTROLS:

Use Arrow keys to move, and use Space to dig a tile.

INSTRUCTIONS

Find the ladder in each level to go a level deeper, and find as much treasure as you can. The deeper you go, the more valuable the treasure will be. Avoid bombs, as they will take some of your time away.

Tiles with an Exclamation mark are proximity tiles. Every tile directly adjacent (horizontal and vertical) to the ladder will be a proximity tile. Every tile BUT 1 directly adjacent to a bomb will be a proximity tile.

CURRENT VERSION: Version 3
